II.ii.2.B.4.j
.
Sample Documentation of the Destruction of a DNA Specimen
The exhibit below represents a sample of the type of documentation that must be placed in a Veteran’s STRs when VA destroys the DNA specimen.
Note
:  The use of a specific form to document this action is not required.
A DNA specimen was found in the STRs.
The sample was destroyed by: [circle one]
incineration
shredding
on____________ [date] by ____________________ [signature and job title].
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Restricted Records Storage and Control
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
